page.title: 08Entertainment
page.content: {Entertainment}in our area Our{Poetry}Evening-by Nick Evans The chairs were set out in the hall. We were all nervous while practising in the J4 area. The important guests started to arrive and then our parents arrived. We lined up in the staff room and walked to our places. Mr.Stephen{Knight}read some of his poems first then it was up to us. We read some poems then it was the turn of the choir.The{choir}came out and sang their songs. At the end of the evening everyone clapped and clapped.We all took home a copy of the anthology,it had a lovely green cover and was full of our very own poems and drawings. It was hard work but we were glad we took part in an entertaining evening.
